Text: CGAS deal Cc Lisa Please follow up w Chris on his email redraft Chris I am now officially in Power Please forward all CES related issues to Lisa and Mary They are also working w the OA team on the os issues Thanks ajc ajc Forwarded by Audrey CookHOUECT on PM Chris Germany AM To Dick CT Kimat CT Audrey CT cc Subject CGAS deal There is a demand charge of x on this deal ticket I think the demand charge should be x x days on the month This equals over the term of the deal I changed the demand charge volume to for Dec for Jan for Feb Audrey the global contract is and is the first month of this deal We should receive and invoice from COH for the demand charge There is a very slim chance we will be selling COH any gas on this deal for the month Would you forward this email to the person that handles COH Thanks chris Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on AM Chris Germany PM To Kimat CT cc Victor CT Alvin nron Subject CGAS deal ENA has a put to COH deal for up to dthday This deal was in the system for December and I just took it to for the whole month I estimate we should make about on the deal change Kimat this deal also has a demand charge that ENA pays COH for the put I believe its in the deal correctly Alvin please show this on the morning sheet as a Put to COH at IF or something real intelligent like that This deal goes thru

Counterparty Name Changes Cc Per The New Power Company Jeff Porter please change the counterparty name on the following deals from Columbia Energy Services Corporation to The New Power Company Chris Germany has confirmed this info w Jeff today Deal Deal Let me know if you have any further questions Please let me know when this has been done Thanks ajc

Please Confirm Deals EnPower Cc Phil I had a some other deals in which the person is out some until Thursday please ensure that these get confirmed by the proper people Thanks ajc Colorado River Commission Mark Guzman Colorado River Commission Leaf Harasin Harbor Cogen Collin Whitehead Willamette Ind Holden Salisbury Forwarded by Audrey CookHOUECT on PM Audrey Cook PM To Phillip CT Jeremy CT cc Kelley CT Rhonda CT Subject Please Confirm Deals EnPower Phil Jeremy Please confirm that the following deals should have zero prices in Enpower If the deal does require a price please ensure that the price is entered into EnPower by PM CST Wednesday January due to our accounting close deadlines If possible when completed please send me a status email Thanks for your help in advance Delano Energy Co Delano Energy Co Tosco Tosco Tosco Wheelabrator Martel Wheelabrator Martel Wheelabrator Martel Atlantic Richfield Atlantic Richfield Atlantic Richfield ajc I can be reached at if you have any further questions

Re Deal Cc Everything looks good Thank you ajc Kate Symes PM To Chris H CT Audrey CT cc Subject Re Deal The following deal has been changed once more Here are the details West Services buys from APX NP Off Peak MW MW TOTAL MWH stays MW Please call me with questions Thanks Kate or From Chris H Foster AM To Kate CT cc Subject Deal Kate Can you please modify that deal that you made the price yesterday to make it for the th only The th is all at Thanks C Forwarded by Chris H FosterHOUECT on AM Audrey Cook AM To Chris H CT cc Subject Deal Chris Good morning Hey one thing I probably did not clarify to you yesterday on was that when the new deal ticket was set up for the price strip Deal the deal should only be in for according to APXs statement not including Therefore the entire offpeak for your deal would be booked on Deal for the price for Let me know if you have any questions Thanks ajc Forwarded by Audrey CookHOUECT on AM Audrey Cook PM To Chris H CT cc Subject APX Chris One more quick thing on APX is showing different prices for offpeak different MW per strip EPMI is showing MW per offpeak hours This difference amounts to a difference APX has lower invoice Can you verify Everything else is finetalk to you next week Have a good weekend ajc

Automated Power Exchange April Checkout Issues Cc Kate Stan Deal Enron is showing for the offpeak load on APX is showing for offpeak on please verify and correct if necessary I have also attached APX invoice per the internet website below for both days Deal APX is currently not showing that this deal occurred for for offpeak load see screen below at the bottom Please verify if this is some other cps deal Thanks ajc Note Please include Godfrey Hyde on your response since I will be out of the office on leave beginning Monday Thank you
